title: 04/08: Year 2 and 3 QBs ... Mahomes #2??? (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
As Patrick Mahomes takes the inevitable step back, which young QBs will take a step up? And can any of them pass Mahomes this season? We give you QBs who will be better in 2019 (1:40) and QBs who will be worse (13:22). Do we prefer Josh Allen or Lamar Jackson?  ... Do Sam Darnold, Mitchell Trubisky, Allen or Jackson have superstar potential? (21:00) And which Year 2 or 3 QB is a sleeper in 2019? ... News and notes from around the NFL with some NFL Draft talk (25:10) plus a possible solution to tanking in dynasty leagues (40:00) ... Your emails at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: Baker Mayfield, Patrick Mahomes, Deshaun Watson, Sam Darnold, Josh Allen, Lamar Jackson and more! We discuss these young QBs and what 2019 looks like for them.
